text: Goe mo au dama daane mo au gau hai hegau ngalua, gi heia nia gowaa o digau di hale o do dangada aamua go Saul, hagabudulia ono huwa e hagahumalia digaula. Gei ogo Mephibosheth dela hua e miami dalia au i dagu deebele i nia laangi huogodoo.” (Ziba ana dama daane gu dilongoholu maa lima, ge madalua ana gau hai hegau.)
